alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ellis County through 730 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Shattuck to 6 miles north of Arnett. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Gage, and Fargo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor NOAA Weather Radio, local radio stations or available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
